HELP_MESSAGE: This is an English help message
help4: !create / !scrim     -  Create events using GCal's default interpreter - works best like !scrim xeno June 5 8pm - 9pm
help5: !delete              -  Delete an event using the form !delete <event_title>, ONLY works when the title matches the one in Google Calendar
help7: !stats / !info       -  Display list of statistics and information about the Niles bot
help8: !invite              -  Get the invite link for Niles to join your server!
help9: !setup               -  Get details on how to setup Niles
help10: !id                  -  Set the Google calendar ID for the guild
help11: !tz                  -  Set the timezone for the guild
help12: !prefix              -  View or change the prefix for Niles
help13: !displayoptions      -  Change formatting of the calendar display
help14: !admin               -  Restrict the usage of Niles to a specific role
